scripts.BoServer:dev: cross-env BABEL_DISABLE_CACHE=1 NODE_ENV=development SERVER_NAME=BoServer nodemon server/boServer.js --ignore 'server/static_dev/' --exec "babel-node --presets es2015,stage-2"
scripts.BoServer:dev:insertInitialData: cross-env BABEL_DISABLE_CACHE=1 NODE_ENV=development SERVER_NAME=BoServer INSERT_INITIAL_DATA=true nodemon server/boServer.js --ignore 'server/static_dev/' --exec "babel-node --presets es2015,stage-2"
scripts.BoServer:prod: npm run BoServer:build:prod && cross-env BABEL_DISABLE_CACHE=1 NODE_ENV=production SERVER_NAME=BoServer nodemon distBoServer/boServer.js
scripts.BoServer:prod:insertInitialData: npm run BoServer:build:prod && cross-env BABEL_DISABLE_CACHE=1 NODE_ENV=production SERVER_NAME=BoServer INSERT_INITIAL_DATA=true nodemon distBoServer/boServer.js
scripts.FoServer:dev: npm run FoServer:build:dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_NAME=FoServer webpack-dev-server --progress --colors --inline --content-base distFoServer --history-api-fallback
scripts.FoServer:build:dev: npm run FoServer:build:misc && cross-env NODE_ENV=development  SERVER_NAME=FoServer webpack
scripts.FoServer:build:prod: npm run FoServer:build:server && npm run FoServer:build:misc && cross-env NODE_ENV=production  SERVER_NAME=FoServer webpack
scripts.FoServer:prod: npm run FoServer:build:prod && cross-env BABEL_DISABLE_CACHE=1 NODE_ENV=production  SERVER_NAME=FoServer nodemon distFoServer/foServer.js
scripts.FoServer:build:misc: npm run FoServer:build:cp_css && npm run FoServer:build:cp_images
scripts.FoServer:build:mkdir: if-env OS=Windows_NT && mkdir distFoServer\images || mkdir distFoServer/images
scripts.FoServer:build:cp_images: if-env OS=Windows_NT && copy .\app\images\*.* distFoServer\images || cp ./app/images/*.* distFoServer/images
scripts.FoServer:build:cp_css: if-env OS=Windows_NT && copy .\app\index.css distFoServer || cp ./app/index.css distFoServer
